comment: Very hard class, but that is just the material.  He gives great tips for remembering and not just memorizing things.

For Lab- tells exactly what need to learn. Memorize (as with A&PI lab), but at least you learn in lecture at same time now. Funny & clarifies any questions you have. Gives handouts (also as attendance). Exams are basic and straight forward. (I didn't study for Lab just for lecture & made A). Take him if you can!!! Will make A&P II workload easier.
This professor is great! By far my favorite. It is a hard class no matter who the professor is but he only makes you learn the things that are actually useful. Very funny. His lab is good too.

By far my favorite professor, not just at KSU but EVER! He's a retired surgeon, so he really knows his stuff and only makes students know what's important. Also, he's extremely funny and makes lectures both interesting, as well as entertaining! Just study/attend class and you'll get an A!
I had him for lab and he is GREAT! So funny and cracks jokes and really helps you out on the practicals. Amazing teacher def try and take him if you can!
Dr. Jones is very smart.  This class is very early and he just reads the power points. Make sure you take advantage of the extra credit project.

Dr. Jones is very knowledgable, kind, and considerant... He has a very straight foward attitude and can probably come off as rude to people who don't understand him... You have to study your butt off if you want to make a good grade!! Study is key to passing his course!!! Highly Recommended!!!

It's a tough class. Dr. Jones gives you the practical information without overloading your brain. Just be warned, your grade will reflect your effort. His tests feel easy but are deceptive. Bottom line: fair, interesting and extremely knowledgeable MD teaching this class, a good option for the KSU student who needs this class.

Dr. Jones was a WONDERFUL teacher!  If you get the chance to take him, register for his class immediately!  Dr. Jones will teach you what you need to know and prepare you for the medical field.  If there is information that you don't have to know in the actual field, he does not make you know it for the test.  He is very helpful!

I had Jones for Anatomy 2 Lab and he was the best teacher I've ever had! He stuck to what was important and he really knows his stuff! The tests are somewhat difficult but he is a pretty easy grader and he is very very fair! Study the handouts he gives you and you'll get an easy A!
I really enjoyed his classes.  He is an excellent professor.  I would not only recommend him, but I also wish that I could take more of his classes.

I found him very unapproachable if I had a problem that I needed to clarify. It seemed as if he was annoyed at the fact that I was asking questions, which is strange because that is what I was paying him for!

Anatomy is hard but Dr. Jones is fantastic! He's a former surgeon so he doesn't make you know anymore than you will need in the real world. He tells you exactly what is on the tests, gives study guides, ALL of his lectures are online, and there are extra credit opportunities. Take this class!

Jones makes this class fun. I struggled with Laser-Hansen and made a D. I am taking him now and have a B! He tells you exactly what to study, has power points ONLINE and you can do EASY extra credit for 3 full points on your FINAL GRADE!!! Don't take anyone else!!!

Incredible professor.  Not only is he quirky and adorable, he LOVES this subject and he makes it fun for everyone, even for the HPS majors.  He is clear on what to study and what is BS.  He's hilarious.  One of the most fair prof's I've ever had & I'm on my 2nd BA degree.  TAKE HIM!!!!!!

Best A&P prof at KSU. It's hard material, but he makes class fun and cuts out extraneous details that other profs insist on. He's laid back, funny & very knowledgeable. Definitely recommend him, you will know your material well, without the stress other profs give ya!

Awesome professor! Makes class extremely interesting when he can, used to be surgeon so brings in pics from his surgeries as well as xrays and CT's. Huge Bulldog fan so wear red and black first day to suck up! He's extremely nice and fair, has a system for extra credit. 4 tests all fair, NEED to read the text book!

The subject matter of this class for any professor is difficult, but Jones made it easy to understand and his posted notes were helpful.  Make sure you study for this class, not just the night before!

Dr. Jones is the best professor. He truely cares about the learning experience. He only requires you to know what is necessary for "the real world" of medicine. He's not as picky as I've heard many of the other professors are. With his experience in the medical field, he knows his stuff. Brings in actual x-rays etc to make it fun and interesting!
LOVE THIS MAN - CANNOT SAY ENOUGH GOOD THINGS ABOUT HIS PERSONALITY OR TEACHING STYLE. CLASS WAS INTERESTING AND I LEARNED A LOT - AVOID TRESHAM AND TAKE JONES FOR A&P!!!!

First off this class is tough no matter who you have. Dr. Jones is a good teacher with real world experience. Also probably one of the best A&P teachers at KSU. I enjoyed his lecture class and lab but it was extremely hard! You can't find an easy teacher for this subject - you just  have to read and study study study!
Great teacher. Very easy o understand. He allows you to see the big picture  and his sense of humor makes the class interesting.
I took Dr. J for A&P1 lab. he is the greatest. if you can take him for lab, you better. he makes the material easier to learn and his lab exams aren't as hard as the other teachers
His lab is hard you need to take his class to be able to do good in his lab.

If you are interested in the human body at all, he's a brilliant resourse. He cuts out information you don't need for nursing, is very straightforward and **** free. My favorite teacher since High School. He moves at a fast enough pace for those who don't need things slowed down.   Once again, a brilliant man.
Teaches only what he believes the students should know. Has notes that you can print off his website. Has some pop quizzes for attendance. Follow his notes and study a lot in his class to do well.

My favorite Prof so far.  The class is hard and a lot to study but he tries to highlight the very important info and cuts out some of the less impt info.  BUY the study guide!!  Worth the $.  Some of his questions are straight from the Study guide.  Very helpful, you just need to ask.

He is awesome!  The class is only difficult because it's Human Anatomy & Physiology...lots of memorization.  He makes the materials simple and fun to learn.  "Keep it simple stupid" like he always says.
No Comments
FABULOUS! He makes things fun and is willing to help you if you need it!
He is great.  He makes class fun and interesting.  Follow his notes and you will do okay.
Finally a DR. with a sense of humor. We should only be so lucky to work with someone like Dr. Jones.

He is the best professor i have ever had. He is very funny. He brings in emails that he gets online. He makes the class interesting. If you use his notes online you will pass. He only gives you the information that you need to know.

Dr. Jones is so awesome. He teaches you stuff you need to know and not superfluous crap. He's so funny and makes fun of himself a lot. Some say he goes fast, but just bring a highlighter and print off the notes online. He gives you an outline for tests and is always available for help via e-mail!
He is a good and understanding professor.
